name: RivetRadio,Inc
0:
”Alexa, ask rivet for sports news”
”Alexa, business news from Rivet”
”Alexa, ask rivet for tech news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rivet
des: Rivet Radio delivers brief, well produced news bites on a variety of topics. Listen to the top 10 headlines in one minute or listen to stories in a specific news category. You can also listen to Associate Press's hourly news updates.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
